<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="normal">      BufferCapacity &#42;= 2;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BufferCapacity &lt; Need)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="normal">        BufferCapacity = Need;</Highlight></CodeLine>
